title: Understanding PivotTable Fields
text: The PivotTable fields task pane is divided into different areas where you can drag and drop fields to organize your data. Can you identify these areas?

title: Explore the Filters Area
text: The Filters area allows you to filter data in the PivotTable. Think about how you can use this to view specific data sets.

title: Columns and Rows Areas
text: The Columns and Rows areas help in organizing data horizontally and vertically. How do these areas affect the layout of your PivotTable?

title: Values Area
text: The Values area is where you place fields that you want to calculate or summarize. What kind of data would you place here?

title: Identify the Field Areas
text: List the field areas in the PivotTable fields task pane.
